price: None will have the power to intercede except those who have taken permission from the Most Compassionate[25].
arabic: لَّا يَمۡلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا
footnotes: [25] Through firmly believing in Him and worshiping Him alone.
